file.name: inner_refs.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Simple spec with $refs
paths:
  /simple:
    post:
      summary: Simple
      operationId: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Simple"
      responses:
        201:
          description: Created
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/DefaultError"

components:
  schemas:
    Simple:
      type: object
      properties:
        fileName:
          type: 1
          format: binary
  responses:
    DefaultError:
      description: unexpected error
      content:
        text/plain:
          schema:
            type: string

Error: unmarshal: callback: json: cannot unmarshal number into Go struct field Schema.type of type string
